title: Looking for a serious mid
body:
I am looking for a mid who is able to play according to a team comp and a build to go with the champion in the team comp.

They must have the ability to use a microphone and teamspeak.

Rank does not matter as long as they are dedicated and looking to play professionally.

We will be looking to play for several hours every day probably around the afternoons.

They need to be 17+ and mature about the game.

Add me in game: whitepumah

replies.body: yeah I completely agree this guy is a complete tosser, I wouldn't be caught dead playing with this guy. Stay away
Hint you don't want to join this guy, have a look at his previous shit on boards for reasons why.
Logic based explanations which have yet to be disproved, but thanks for your interest.

Well, I'd be willing to give it a shot. I'm a d5 mid main.
Send me an add in game and arrange a time for us to play if you're keen.
I'm not super impressed by these board posts, but if I have a good time playing with you thats all that matters to me.
Still looking for a mid lane.
